line: Shawty on the block with me, wearin' Chanel
Too much dope in here, I can't smell-smell (too mu' dope)
Too many guns in here, I can tell a tale (tell a tale)
Heat in my hand, no oven mitt
Take yo' block and tumble it (tumble it)
Bitch, give me that cookie, I'm crumblin' (crumblin')
Uh-uh, you lovin' that ho (lovin' that ho)
The way that go, I never ever know
Rollin' up Ps, cappin' that O, get sparked from the heat that was definite, though
You can try to run, but you catchin' them, though
Wanna fuck in these mouth like I'm M&Ms, though
It's a hit-and-run, hit the ambulance, ho
Ice in my cup, December twenty-fo'
Smoke get me higher than the airfield, though
Mama told me "Never ever fear," though
Go to court, smellin' like I sell elbows
Ha-ha, you was poppin' that shit (poppin' that shit)
Now the window down, start poppin' them sticks
Ha-ha, you was not with that shit (not with that shit)
You don't even know what come with that shit (with that shit, hey)
Better run, run, run up the blue bummers (bummers)
Bitch with me, all in my arms, yeah (my arms, yeah)
After that I sent her home and I don't care (don't care, yeah)
We want all the smoke, we got mob fare (mob fare)
Shawty on the block with me, wearin' Chanel
Too much dope in here, I can't smell-smell (too mu' dope)
Too many guns in here, I can tell a tale (tell a tale)
